title: Burnout Risk Test
question: Question
answer_guide: Please select a number below. (1: Not at all ~ 5: Very much)

questions.q1: Do you feel less motivated at work recently?
questions.q2: Is it hard to get up in the morning?
questions.q3: Do you feel tired even after work or study?
questions.q4: Do you feel skeptical about your work?
questions.q6: Do you feel your work is meaningless?
questions.q7: Are your relationships with people not as good as before?
questions.q8: Do you get irritated or sensitive over small things?
questions.q9: Do you tend to procrastinate or avoid work more often?

result_normal: You are within the normal range.
result_high: High risk of burnout. Consider consulting a professional.
